tankOne.name: Leopard 2A7V
tankOne.description: A modern modification of the German main battle tank Leopard 2. Introduced in update 2.33 'Air Dominance'.

tankTwo.name: Leopard 2A4M
tankTwo.description: A modern modification of the German main battle tank Leopard 2. Introduced in update 2.33 'Air Dominance'.

tankThree.name: T-80BVM
tankThree.description: An upgrade of the T-80BV tank. During the modernization, the combat vehicle was equipped with third‑generation reactive armour 'Relikt'.

tankFour.name: BMPT-72
tankFour.description: Russian tank support combat vehicle in the game War Thunder. Introduced in 2013 as a conversion of the T-72A/B chassis to extend the service life of obsolete tanks.

tankFive.name: Challenger 2 OES
tankFive.description: A modification of the British main battle tank Challenger 2 for urban combat operations.

tankSix.name: CRV BLOCK2
tankSix.description: Wheeled infantry fighting vehicle (IFV) of the UK, Rank VII, introduced into the game as one of the event rewards.

tankSeven.name: VRCC
tankSeven.description: Export version of the Italian Centauro for the Spanish Army, featured in the game War Thunder.

tankEight.name: CV90105
tankEight.description: Swedish light tank in the game War Thunder, a prototype developed by the Swedish company Hägglunds in cooperation with the Belgian company CMI in the mid‑1990s.

tankNine.name: Leopard 2A4
tankNine.description: A modification of the German main battle tank Leopard 2, entered service with Germany in the mid‑1980s.

tankTen.name: T-90M
tankTen.description: Modern main battle tank (MBT) in the game War Thunder, developed under the 'Proryv' (Breakthrough) modernization program. It is a modification of the Russian T-90A tank.
